# Agroecology

<br>

* Effects of environmental changes (e.g., warming and drought) on crop-pest-enemy dynamics and biological control

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

* Habitat manipulation to enhance ecosystem services (e.g., pollination) and reduce ecosystem dis-services (e.g., pest damage) in agricultural field

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

* Designing management schemes for species conservation and habitat protection (e.g., climate-change refugia and ecological hotspots) under climate change and anthropogenic threats
